messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does a victim take damage from constriction?
The victim takes 1 point of damage per round, increasing by 1 point each round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can friends do to help a victim being swallowed?
Friends can attempt to slay the monster to free the victim.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a formless spawn capable of doing while swallowing prey?
A formless spawn can make one Bite attack per round and continue to swallow prey until it has swallowed its own SIZ in prey.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can a formless spawn do after swallowing prey?
After swallowing prey, a formless spawn may continue to fight but may not shift location without disgorging what it has swallowed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the range of a monster's Grab attack?
The range of a monster's Grab attack is always one-fifth of the monster's SIZ in yards.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a formless spawn when it swallows its own SIZ in prey?
It may not shift location without disgorging what it has swallowed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the range of Grab (mnvr) attack?
The range is always one-fifth of the monster's SIZ in yards.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of the time does a formless spawn deal damage with Bite?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of the time does a formless spawn have a Dodge chance?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the source of a formless spawn's Sanity points?
1/1D10 Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of damage is dealt by a Ghast's Grab attack?

What percentage of damage is dealt by a Ghast's Bite attack?

How much damage is dealt by a Ghast's Grab attack?
2D6 + damage bonus

What percentage of damage is dealt by a Ghast's Dodge attack?

How much Sanity points is a Ghast immune to?

What is the condition that causes ghasts to die?
Exposed to direct sunlight, they sicken and eventually die.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do ghasts primarily eat?
Each other and other beings they catch.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Are ghasts likely the result of genetic experimentation?
If they are relatives of, or examples of, the humans who inhabit the cavern of K’n-Yan.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
